headline: After Soaring 84% in 5 Years, Is the Invesco QQQ Trust Still a Good ETF to Buy in 2026?
summary: The ETF's returns have been flat this year, as growth stocks have been struggling of late.

headline: US Retail Sales Stall in December
summary: US retail sales unexpectedly stalled in December coming in unchanged. Eight out of 13 retail categories saw decreases during the holiday season. Invesco's Kristina Campmany says consumers are on edge and being more selective.

raw.headline: US Retail Sales Stall in December
raw.summary: US retail sales unexpectedly stalled in December coming in unchanged. Eight out of 13 retail categories saw decreases during the holiday season. Invesco's Kristina Campmany says consumers are on edge and being more selective.

headline: Invesco Ltd. Announces January 31, 2026 Assets Under Management
summary: Invesco Ltd. (NYSE: IVZ)1, a leading global asset management firm announced today preliminary month-end assets under management (AUM) of $2,231.7 billion, an increase of 2.8% versus previous month-end. The firm delivered net long-term inflows of $16.9 billion in the month. Non-management fee earning net inflows were $0.3 billion and money market net outflows were $0.2 billion. AUM was positively impacted by favorable market returns which increased AUM by $39 billion. FX increased AUM by $6.0 bil

headline: A Look At Invesco (IVZ) Valuation After Swing To 2025 Net Loss Despite Ongoing Capital Returns
summary: Invesco (IVZ) is under renewed scrutiny after reporting a fourth quarter net loss of US$1,061.1 million and a full year 2025 net loss of US$281.7 million, despite slightly higher revenue. See our latest analysis for Invesco. The earnings release, which revealed a swing to sizeable quarterly and full year losses, has come alongside continued common and preferred dividend announcements and the completion of a long running share buyback, and the share price now sits at US$26.89. Despite a 12.6%...
